> <OLD>
>
> Nightshift quickly tries to man a computer to try and get specs on the
> tower.
>
> " Slag, we gotta find a weak spot, pronto, and go with it!  That tower has
> gotta go!" Scan'n for vulnerabilities now!"

<NEW>

"Slag man! That tower *is* Cryonosis," WOLFGANG said as he and RAMULUS
also manned defensive stations.

True enough as NIGHTSHIFT called up information the computer
identified the tower is CRYONOSIS the tower that hosed the MAXIMAL
WATCHERS. A quick analysis of the attack patturned showed that it was
an automated defense patturn.

"I am bringing us around to the back side of the mountains." POLAR
CLAW said from the front cabin. "Brace yourselves, this is not going
to be easy, but it should get us out of the line of fire."

The shipped bucked again as another shot hit "We're coming in" PROWL
said from his position next to POLAR CLAW. "The shields are buckling."

(TAG)

Preston
